# Table Component

### Table

**Exports:**
- `Table.Root` - Root table container
- `Table.Caption` - Table caption
- `Table.Colgroup` - Column group
- `Table.Col` - Column definition
- `Table.Header` - Table header section
- `Table.Head` - Table head row
- `Table.Row` - Table row
- `Table.Cell` - Table cell
- `Table.Body` - Table body section
- `Table.Footer` - Table footer

**Usage:**
```svelte
<script lang="ts">
	import { Table } from 'kampsy-ui';
</script>

<div class="w-full">
    <Table.Root>
		<Table.Header>
            <Table.Row>
        	    <Table.Head>Col 1</Table.Head>
        	    <Table.Head>Col 2</Table.Head>
        	    <Table.Head>Col 3</Table.Head>
            </Table.Row>
        </Table.Header>
        <Table.Body>
            <Table.Row>
                <Table.Cell>Value 1.1</Table.Cell>
                <Table.Cell>Value 1.2</Table.Cell>
                <Table.Cell>Value 1.3</Table.Cell>
            </Table.Row>
            <Table.Row>
                <Table.Cell>Value 2.1</Table.Cell>
                <Table.Cell>Value 2.2</Table.Cell>
                <Table.Cell>Value 2.3</Table.Cell>
            </Table.Row>
            <Table.Row>
                <Table.Cell>Value 3.1</Table.Cell>
                <Table.Cell>Value 3.2</Table.Cell>
                <Table.Cell>Value 3.3</Table.Cell>
            </Table.Row>
        </Table.Body>
    </Table.Root>
</div>
```

## Installation

```bash
pnpm i -D kampsy-ui@latest
```

## Documentation

Visit http://ui.kampsy.xyz/table for full documentation and examples.
